name: AIM MORE!
description:
is a three-act narrative game in pixel style made by Unity. It is a narrative meta game that looks like an air combat game.

In this game, what the deceloper want to explore is, when a game has an advanced level of playability (for example, after the game has a plot, a change in gameplay, or an emotional 

advancement), whether the player is driven by the purpose of the game, or if the player falls to the first stage for any other reason, it means the game is over.
